name: PomboTroll
description:
PomboTroll is an extremely comedic 2D game. Enter the skin of a very @#$%! pigeon and earn points defecating and vomiting in the other birds. Challenge another player to a battle of disgusted and be the most troll pigeon of all!

Objective:

Fly as far as possible, making a higher score messing everyone in front of you and win the prize of the most troll pigeon of all.

Single Player:

In single player mode, you will be alone with the goal of flying far, scoring high! For this you will have to eliminate your enemies by acquiring "ammunition" and powerups
by the way.


Versus Mode:

Versus mode, two players compete for "ammunition" and powerups to have the highest score and the title of the most troll pigeon of all.


Control:
